Citing gamba

If you use gamba in an academic publication, citing the following paper would be greatly appreciated:

gamba: Open Source Gambling Transaction Analysis in Python, Scholten et al, 2020

APA Style

Scholten, O.J., Zendle, D., & Walker, J.A. (2020). gamba: Open Source Gambling Transaction Analysis in Python. https://gamba.dev

Bibtex Entry

@article{gamba,
     title={gamba: Open Source Gambling Transaction Analysis in Python},
     author={Scholten, O. J. and Zendle, D and Walker, J. A.},
     journal={OSF Preprints},
     year={2020},
     url={https://gamba.dev}
}
